attributes.action: Accept any refugees fleeing violence in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: The Ukrainian people are facing violence and repression that seemed unimaginable in modern Europe. To abandon them to war and subjugation is inhuman and would be a betrayal of the core ideals of our nation. We have a moral obligation to offer peaceful sanctuary to victims of the war in Ukraine.
attributes.background: Parliament must pass an act to accept any refugees or asylum seekers fleeing Ukraine with a Ukrainian passport. The government, in turn, must give logistical support to help them reach the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
